meanings.meaning_en_US: Being number 1000 in a sequence.

examples.sentence: She was the [thousandth] customer of the day.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 她是今天的第一千位顧客

examples.sentence: The event marked the [thousandth] anniversary of the city.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 這個事件標誌著這座城市的第一千周年

examples.sentence: He finished in [thousandth] place in the ranking.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 他在排名中獲得第一千名

meanings.meaning_en_US: The ordinal number corresponding to the number forty.

examples.sentence: She celebrated her [fortieth] anniversary.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 她慶祝了她的第四十個週年紀念。

examples.sentence: We are planning a party for his [fortieth] birthday.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 我們正在為他的第四十個生日計劃派對。

examples.sentence: The book is about the fortieth generation of the family.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 這本書是關於這個家庭的第四十代。

meanings.meaning_en_US: The ordinal number corresponding to the number sixty.

examples.sentence: This is the [sixtieth] episode of the series.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 這是這個系列的第六十集。

examples.sentence: We are celebrating our [sixtieth] wedding anniversary.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 我們正在慶祝我們的第六十個結婚紀念日。

examples.sentence: The [sixtieth] anniversary of the event is next year.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 該事件的第六十周年將在明年舉行。

meanings.meaning_en_US: Being number 1,000,000,000 in a sequence.

examples.sentence: The company celebrated their [billionth] sale.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 公司慶祝了他們的第一十億銷售

examples.sentence: He became the [billionth] visitor to the site.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 他成為網站的第一十億位訪客

examples.sentence: They marked their [billionth] transaction this year.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 他們今年標誌著第一十億筆交易

meanings.meaning_en_US: Being number 90 in a sequence.

examples.sentence: The team celebrated their [ninetieth] win of the season.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 該隊慶祝他們本賽季的第九十場勝利

examples.sentence: Her [ninetieth] birthday will be a grand event.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 她的第九十個生日將是一個盛大的活動

examples.sentence: He was the [ninetieth] person to finish the marathon.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 他是完成馬拉松的第九十個人

meanings.meaning_en_US: The ordinal number corresponding to the number seventy.

examples.sentence: This year marks my [seventieth] birthday.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 今年是我七十歲的生日。

examples.sentence: They attended their [seventieth] class reunion.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 他們參加了第七十屆班會。

examples.sentence: The festival is celebrating its [seventieth] anniversary.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 該節慶正在慶祝其第七十個周年。

meanings.meaning_en_US: Being number 80 in a sequence.

examples.sentence: The celebration marked her [eightieth] birthday.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 這次慶祝活動標誌著她的第八十個生日

examples.sentence: He finished in [eightieth] place in the race.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 他在比賽中獲得第八十名

examples.sentence: Her [eightieth] anniversary at work is next month.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 她在工作中的第八十個周年下個月就到了

meanings.meaning_en_US: The second day of the week, following Sunday.

examples.sentence: I have a meeting every [Monday].
examples.translation_zh_TW: 我每個星期一都有會議

examples.sentence: She dislikes waking up early on [Mondays].
examples.translation_zh_TW: 她不喜歡在星期一早起

examples.sentence: The store opens at 9 AM on [Mondays].
examples.translation_zh_TW: 商店在星期一早上九點開門

synonyms: first day of the work week

meanings.meaning_en_US: The first month of the year in the Gregorian calendar.

examples.sentence: My birthday is in [January].
examples.translation_zh_TW: 我的生日在一月

examples.sentence: We plan to travel in [January].
examples.translation_zh_TW: 我們計劃在一月旅行

examples.sentence: The new year begins in [January].
examples.translation_zh_TW: 新年在一月開始

meanings.meaning_en_US: The sixth month of the year in the Gregorian calendar.

examples.sentence: June is often considered the start of summer.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 六月份通常被認為是夏天的開始。

examples.sentence: My birthday is in [June].
examples.translation_zh_TW: 我的生日在六月。

examples.sentence: We plan to go on vacation in [June].
examples.translation_zh_TW: 我們計劃在六月去度假。

meanings.meaning_en_US: Satisfactory, acceptable.

examples.sentence: It's [OK] to ask for help.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 尋求幫助是可以接受的。

examples.sentence: She said it was [OK] to borrow her book.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 她說借她的書是可以的。

examples.sentence: [OK], let's move on to the next topic.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 好吧，讓我們進入下一個主題。

meanings.meaning_en_US: The second month of the year in the Gregorian calendar, typically having 28 days.

examples.sentence: I was born in [February].
examples.translation_zh_TW: 我是在二月出生的。

examples.sentence: February is a short month.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 二月是一個短月。

examples.sentence: [February] has only 28 days, except in leap years.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 二月只有28天，除了閏年。

meanings.meaning_en_US: The day of the week following Friday.

examples.sentence: [Saturday] is my favorite day of the week.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 星期六是我最喜歡的一天

examples.sentence: We usually go to the market on [Saturdays].
examples.translation_zh_TW: 我們通常在星期六去市場

examples.sentence: I have a meeting scheduled for [Saturday].
examples.translation_zh_TW: 我有一個會議安排在星期六

meanings.meaning_en_US: The tenth month of the year in the Gregorian calendar.

examples.sentence: My birthday is in [October].
examples.translation_zh_TW: 我的生日在十月。

examples.sentence: The leaves start to change color in [October].
examples.translation_zh_TW: 十月樹葉開始變色。

examples.sentence: Halloween is celebrated on the last day of [October].
examples.translation_zh_TW: 萬聖節在十月的最後一天慶祝。

meanings.meaning_en_US: The divisions of the year marked by changes in weather, ecology, and daylight.

examples.sentence: There are four distinct [seasons] in a year.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 一年有四個明顯的季節。

examples.sentence: Autumn is my favorite [season].
examples.translation_zh_TW: 秋天是我最喜歡的季節。

examples.sentence: Each [season] has its unique beauty.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 每個季節都有其獨特的美。

meanings.meaning_en_US: The twelfth month of the year in the Gregorian calendar.

examples.sentence: We celebrate Christmas in [December].
examples.translation_zh_TW: 我們在十二月慶祝聖誕節。

examples.sentence: My birthday is in [December].
examples.translation_zh_TW: 我的生日在十二月。

examples.sentence: December is a winter month in the northern hemisphere.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 十二月是北半球的冬季月份。

meanings.meaning_en_US: The eleventh month of the year in the Gregorian calendar.

examples.sentence: Thanksgiving is celebrated in [November].
examples.translation_zh_TW: 感恩節是在十一月慶祝。

examples.sentence: The weather gets colder in [November].
examples.translation_zh_TW: 十一月的天氣變得更冷。

examples.sentence: Holidays often start in [November].
examples.translation_zh_TW: 假期通常在十一月開始。

meanings.meaning_en_US: A casual shirt with short sleeves and no collar, typically made of cotton.

examples.sentence: He wore a red [T-shirt] to the party.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 他穿了一件紅色的 T 恤參加派對。

examples.sentence: My favorite [T-shirt] has a cool design.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 我最喜歡的 T 恤有一個酷酷的設計。

examples.sentence: She bought a new [T-shirt] from the store.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 她在商店買了一件新的 T 恤。

meanings.meaning_en_US: The day of the week between Tuesday and Thursday.

examples.sentence: Meeting is scheduled for Wednesday.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 會議安排在星期三

examples.sentence: She always feels tired on Wednesdays.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 她在星期三總是感到疲倦

examples.sentence: I usually go grocery shopping on Wednesday.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 我通常在星期三去購物

meanings.meaning_en_US: Any of the twelve periods into which a year is divided.

examples.sentence: The project will take several [months] to complete.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 該專案需要幾個月份才能完成。

examples.sentence: There are twelve [months] in a year.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 一年有十二個月份。

examples.sentence: The winter [months] can be very cold.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 冬季的月份可能非常寒冷。
